entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

entry.title: 菜鸟
entry.content: 菜鸟起飞第一步 代码:<!DOCTYPE html><html lang="en"><head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <title>Title</title> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, user-scalable=no, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/animate.min.css"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/reset.min.css"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/swiper.min.css"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/geren.css"> <script> var desW = 640; var winW =document.documentElement.clientWidth; document.documentElement.style.fontSize = winW/desW*100+"px"; </script></head><body><div class="swiper-container"> <div class="music musicMove" id="music"> <audio src="audioFile/Shakira - Try Everything.mp3" id="beautiful" autoplay></audio> </div> <div class="swiper-wrapper"> <div class="swiper-slide slide1" id="page1"> <!-- <div class="div"> <h1>个人简历</h1> </div>--> <div class="shou"> <div> <h1>简<br>历</h1> </div> </div> <div class="shou1"> <h1>李<br>国<br>伟<br>的<br>个<br>人<br>简<br>历</h1> </div> </div> <div class="swiper-slide slide2"> <!--<div class="div"> <h1>个人简历</h1> </div>--> <ul class="u2" id="d1"> <h1 class="h1">个人信息</h1> <li class="i1"><i class="w1">姓名：</i><span class="w2">李国伟</span></li> <li class="i2"><i class="w1">性别：</i><span class="w2">男</span></li> <li class="i3"><i class="w1">年龄：</i><span class="w2">21岁</span></li> <li class="i4"><i class="w1">学历：</i><span class="w2">大专</span></li> <li class="i5"><i class="w1">职业：</i><span class="w2">学生</span></li> <li class="i6"><i class="w1">学校：</i><span class="w2">河北软件职业技术学院</span></li> </ul> </div> <div class="swiper-slide slide3"> <!-- <div class="div"> <h1>个人简历</h1> </div>--> <div class="jian"> <h2>专业技能 <p>Specialized Skill</p> </h2> </div> <ul class="u1"> <li class="ii1">PS:&nbsp&nbsp熟练ps对图片操作</li> <li class="ii2">H5:&nbsp&nbsp熟练h5运用</li> <li class="ii3">JS:&nbsp&nbsp对js简单运用</li> <li class="ii4">CSS:&nbsp&nbsp精通css样式操作</li> <li class="ii5">HTML:&nbsp&nbsp精通html静态页面</li> </ul> </div> <div class="swiper-slide slide4"> <!--<div class="div"> <h1 >个人简介</h1> </div>--> <div class="zuo"> <em class="span2"></em> <h3 class="span1">在校经历</h3> </div> <!--<div class="bie"></div>--> <div class="zuo1"> <p class="c1">2015</p> <i class="c2">2015年暑假公司打工,在公司中</i> <span class="s1">磨砺社会经验，在学校开始为</span> <b class="c3">期一年零时工。</b> </div> <div class="zuo2"> <p class="c4">2016</p> <i class="c5">2016年担任手工社社长，并 </i> <b class="c6">参加院级网页比赛</b> <span class="s2">获2015年优秀团员，系</span> <u class="c7">级三等奖学金。</u> </div> <div class="zuo3"> <p class="c8">2017</p> <i class="c9">经过老师的讲授开</i> <span class="s3">始制作项目</span> <u class="c10">会简单的网页制作，</u> <b class="c11">移动端的页面设计。</b> </div> </div> <div class="swiper-slide slide5"> <!--<div class="div"> <h1>个人简历</h1> </div>--> <div class="lian"> <p>联系方式</p> </div> <ul> <li class="dian1">电话:18712943084</li> <li class="dian2">QQ:1032141574</li> <li class="dian3">邮箱:1032141574@qq.com</li> <li class="dian4">地址：河北省石家庄</li> </ul> <p class="dian5">联系我</p> </div> <div class="swiper-slide slide6"> <!--<div class="div"> <h1>个人简历</h1> </div>--> <div class="hou1"> <p class="hou4">李国伟</p> </div> <div class="hou2"> <img src="img/u4.jpg" alt=""> </div> <div class="hou3"> 扫我 </div> </div> </div></div></body></html><script src="js/swiper.min.js"></script><script> var mySwiper = new Swiper(".swiper-container",{ direction:"horizontal", pagination:".swiper-pagination", /*autoplay:5000,*/ effecf:"coverflow", onTransitionEnd:function (swiper) { var slides = swiper.slides; var curIndex = swiper.activeIndex; //获取当前所滑到的滑块 for(var i = 0;i<slides.length;i++){ //把所有滑块名去掉 slides[i].id = ""; } slides[curIndex].id = "page"+(curIndex+1);//给当前滑块付名 } } ) var music = document.getElementById("music"); var audio1 = document.getElementById("beautiful"); /* * audio1.play() 让音频文件播放 * audio1.pause() 让音频文件停止播放 * audio1.paused 判断当前音频文件是播放还是停止 true停止 false播放 * */ music.onclick = function(){//点击时做一些事情 if(audio1.paused){//如果是停止，则让其播放，并且转动 audio1.play(); music.className = "music musicMove"; }else{//如果播放，则让其停止，并且停止转动 audio1.pause(); music.className = "music"; } }</script>.music{ width: 0.6rem; height: 0.6rem; background: url(../audioFile/u1.jpg) no-repeat; background-size: 0.6rem 0.6rem; background-color: transparent; border-radius: 0.6rem; position: absolute; right: 0.2rem; top: 0.2rem; z-index: 11111;}.musicMove{ -webkit-animation:move 1.5s infinite linear both; animation:move 1.5s infinite linear both;}@-webkit-keyframes move { 0%{ -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg); transform: rotate(0deg); } 100%{ -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); transform: rotate(360deg); }}@keyframes move { 0%{ -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg); transform: rotate(0deg); } 100%{ -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); transform: rotate(360deg); }}*{ margin:0; padding:0;}html,body{ width:100%; height:100%;}.swiper-container{ width:100%; height:100%;}.swiper-wrapper>div>.div{ height:1.2rem; background-color: #261a3b; position: relative; }.swiper-wrapper>div>.div>h1{ color:white; text-align: center; width: 100%; font-size: 0.5rem; position: absolute; bottom:0.1rem;}.slide1{ background-image: url("../img/b1.jpg"); background-size:100% 100% ;}.slide1>.shou,.shou1{ opacity: 0;}.slide1>.shou{ margin-top:1.5rem;}.slide1>.shou>div{ width:2.5rem; height: 2.5rem; border:0.08rem solid white; box-shadow:0 0 0.6rem white; border-radius: 50%; margin: 1rem auto; position: relative; text-align: center; -webkit-animation: action 5s linear infinite; animation: action 5s linear infinite;}#page1>.shou{ -webkit-animation:zoomIn 1s linear both; animation:zoomIn 1s linear both;}@-webkit-keyframes action { from { -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg); transform: rotate(0deg); } to { -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); transform: rotate(360deg); }}@keyframes action { from { -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg); transform: rotate(0deg); } to { -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); transform: rotate(360deg); }}.slide1>.shou>div>h1{ color:white; font-size: 0.8rem; margin-top: 0.15rem;}#page1>.shou1{ -webkit-animation: slideInDown 2s 1s linear both; animation: slideInDown 2s 1s linear both;}.slide1>.shou1{ width:1rem; height: 3.5rem; border:0.08rem outset white; border-top-color: transparent; border-bottom-color: transparent; margin: 1rem auto; text-align: center;}.slide1>.shou1>h1{ font-size: 0.4rem; color:white; margin-top: -0.35rem;}.slide2{ background-image: url("../img/b3.png"); background-color: aliceblue; position: relative;}.slide2>#d1>.h1,.i1>.w1,.w2,.i2>.w1,.w2,.i3>.w1,.w2,.i4>.w1,.w2,.i5>.w1,.w2,.i6>.w1,.w2{ display:inline-block; opacity: 0;}.slide2 ul{ /*margin: 2rem 15%;*/ position: absolute; top:18%; left: 15%;}.slide2>ul>h1{ margin-bottom: 0.8rem; text-indent: 0.32rem; font-size:0.5rem; color: darkslateblue;}#page2>ul>h1{ -webkit-animation: flipInX 2s linear both; animation: flipInX 2s linear both;}.slide2>ul>li { height: 1rem; line-height: 0.8rem; /*color:white;*/ font-size: 0.4rem; margin-bottom: 0.2rem; color:darkslateblue;}.slide2>ul>li>i{ font-style: normal; font-weight:bold;}.slide2>ul>li>span{ font-style: normal;}#page2>ul>.i1>i{ -webkit-animation: bounceInLeft 1s 1s linear both; animation: bounceInLeft 1s 1s linear both; }#page2>ul>.i1>span{ -webkit-animation: bounceInRight 1s 1s linear both; animation: bounceInRight 1s 1s linear both;}#page2>ul>.i2>i{ -webkit-animation: bounceInLeft 1s 2s linear both; animation: bounceInLeft 1s 2s linear both;}#page2>ul>.i2>span{ -webkit-animation: bounceInRight 1s 2s linear both; animation: bounceInRight 1s 2s linear both;}#page2>ul>.i3>i{ -webkit-animation: bounceInLeft 1s 3s linear both; animation: bounceInLeft 1s 3s linear both;}#page2>ul>.i3>span{ -webkit-animation: bounceInRight 1s 3s linear both; animation: bounceInRight 1s 3s linear both;}#page2>ul>.i4>i{ -webkit-animation: bounceInLeft 1s 4s linear both; animation: bounceInLeft 1s 4s linear both;}#page2>ul>.i4>span{ -webkit-animation: bounceInRight 1s 4s linear both; animation: bounceInRight 1s 4s linear both;}#page2>ul>.i5>i{ -webkit-animation: bounceInLeft 1s 5s linear both; animation: bounceInLeft 1s 5s linear both;}#page2>ul>.i5>span{ -webkit-animation: bounceInRight 1s 5s linear both; animation: bounceInRight 1s 5s linear both;}#page2>ul>.i6>i{ -webkit-animation: bounceInLeft 1s 6s linear both; animation: bounceInLeft 1s 6s linear both;}#page2>ul>.i6>span{ -webkit-animation: bounceInRight 1s 6s linear both; animation: bounceInRight 1s 6s linear both;}.slide3{ background-image: url("../img/b2.png"); background-size: 100% 100%; background-color: lightcyan;}.slide3>.jian{ width: 100%; height: 1.6rem; line-height: 1.6rem; background: rgba(204,211,228,0.6); opacity: 0.8; text-indent: 0.4rem;}#page3>.jian{ -webkit-animation: flipInX 2s linear both; animation: flipInX 2s linear both;}.slide3>.jian,.u1>li{ opacity: 0;}.slide3>.jian>h2{ color:darkcyan; font-size: 0.6rem;}.slide3>.jian>h2>p{ font-size:0.1rem ; line-height: normal; margin-top: -0.4rem; text-indent: 0.5rem;}.slide3>ul>li{ width: 100%; height: 1.6rem; line-height: 1.6rem; background: rgba(204,211,228,0.5); margin-top: 0.225rem; border-radius: 1.4rem; border: 1px solid #ccd3e4; color: darkcyan; font-size: 0.4rem; text-indent: 0.6rem; font-weight: bold; display: inline-block;}#page3>ul>.ii1{ -webkit-animation: flipInX 2s 1.5s linear both; animation: flipInX 2s 1.5s linear both;}#page3>ul>.ii2{ -webkit-animation: flipInX 2s 2s linear both; animation: flipInX 2s 2s linear both;}#page3>ul>.ii3{ -webkit-animation: flipInX 2s 2.5s linear both; animation: flipInX 2s 2.5s linear both; }#page3>ul>.ii4{ -webkit-animation: flipInX 2s 3s linear both; animation: flipInX 2s 3s linear both; }#page3>ul>.ii5{ -webkit-animation: flipInX 2s 3.5s linear both; animation: flipInX 2s 3.5s linear both; }.slide4{ background-color: whitesmoke; background:url("../img/b7.png") no-repeat; background-size: 95%; background-position:0.2rem 1rem; position: relative;}.slide4>.bie{ position: absolute; top:0rem; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-image: url("../img/e2.png") ; background-size: 50%; opacity: 1;}.slide4>.zuo{ margin: 0; position: relative; margin-top: 0.2rem;}.slide4>.zuo,.span1,.span2,.c1,.c2,.c3,.c4,.c5,.c6,.c7,.c8,.c9,.c10,.c11,.c12,.s1,.s2,.s3{ opacity: 0; }#page4>.zuo,.span1,.span2{ -webkit-animation:bounceInUp 1s linear both ; animation:bounceInUp 1s linear both ;}#page4>.zuo1>.c1{ -webkit-animation:bounceInUp 1s 1s linear both ; animation:bounceInUp 1s 1s linear both ;}#page4>.zuo1>.c2{ -webkit-animation:bounceInUp 1s 1.8s linear both ; animation:bounceInUp 1s 1.8s linear both ;}#page4>.zuo1>.s1{ -webkit-animation:bounceInUp 1s 2.6s linear both ; animation:bounceInUp 1s 2.6s linear both ;}#page4>.zuo1>.c3{ -webkit-animation:bounceInUp 1s 3.4s linear both ; animation:bounceInUp 1s 3.4s linear both ;}#page4>.zuo2>.c4{ -webkit-animation:bounceInUp 1s 4.4s linear both ; animation:bounceInUp 1s 4.4s linear both ;}#page4>.zuo2>.c5{ -webkit-animation:bounceInUp 1s 5.2s linear both ; animation:bounceInUp 1s 5.2s linear both ;}#page4>.zuo2>.c6{ -webkit-animation:bounceInUp 1s 6s linear both ; animation:bounceInUp 1s 6s linear both ;}#page4>.zuo2>.s2{ -webkit-animation:bounceInUp 1s 6.8s linear both ; animation:bounceInUp 1s 6.8s linear both ;}#page4>.zuo2>.c7{ -webkit-animation:bounceInUp 1s 7.6s linear both ; animation:bounceInUp 1s 7.6s linear both ;}#page4>.zuo3>.c8{ -webkit-animation:bounceInUp 1s 8.6s linear both ; animation:bounceInUp 1s 8.6s linear both ; }#page4>.zuo3>.c9{ -webkit-animation:bounceInUp 1s 9.4s linear both ; animation:bounceInUp 1s 9.4s linear both ;}#page4>.zuo3>.s3{ -webkit-animation:bounceInUp 1s 10.2s linear both ; animation:bounceInUp 1s 10.2s linear both ;}#page4>.zuo3>.c10{ -webkit-animation:bounceInUp 1s 11s linear both ; animation:bounceInUp 1s 11s linear both ;}#page4>.zuo3>.c11{ -webkit-animation:bounceInUp 1s 11.8s linear both ; animation:bounceInUp 1s 11.8s linear both ;}.slide4>.zuo>.span1{ display: inline-block; width: 1.75rem; height: 0.8rem; line-height: 0.8rem; color: white; font-size: 0.36rem; font-weight: bold; background-color: #0c9c98; border: none; position: absolute; left:0.383rem;}.slide4>.zuo>.span2{ display: inline-block; border:0.4rem solid #0c9c98; border-top-color: transparent; border-bottom-color: transparent; border-left-color: transparent; position: absolute; left:-0.4rem;}.slide4>.zuo1{ width: 4rem; height: 2rem; position: absolute; top: 3.7rem; left: 1rem;}.slide4>.zuo1>p{ font-size: 0.3rem; margin-top: 0.2rem; margin-left: -0.11rem; color:#261a3b; font-weight: bold; text-align:center; margin-bottom:0.35rem;}.slide4>.zuo1>i{ display:block; font-style: normal; font-size: 0.25rem; color:#261a3b; margin-left: 0.4rem; line-height: 0.5rem; }.slide4>.zuo1>.s1{ display:block; margin-top: 0.08rem; font-size: 0.25rem; color:#261a3b; margin-left: 0.6rem;}.slide4>.zuo1>b{ display: block; margin-left: 1.1rem; margin-top: 0.08rem; font-size: 0.25rem; color:#261a3b; font-weight: normal;}.slide4>.zuo2{ width: 4rem; height: 2rem; position: absolute; top: 5.8rem; right: 0rem;}.slide4>.zuo2>p{ text-align: right; font-size: 0.3rem; color:#261a3b; font-weight: bold; margin-right: 0.4rem; margin-bottom: 2rem;}.slide4>.zuo2>i{ display: block; font-size: 0.25rem; color:#261a3b; margin-left: 0.9rem; font-style: normal;}.slide4>.zuo2>.c6{ display: block; font-size: 0.25rem; color:#261a3b; margin-left: 1.2rem; font-weight: normal; margin-top: 0.08rem;}.slide4>.zuo2>.s2{ display: block; font-size: 0.25rem; color:#261a3b; margin-left: 1.3rem; margin-top: 0.08rem; font-weight: normal;}.slide4>.zuo2>u{ display: block; font-size: 0.25rem; color:#261a3b; text-decoration: none; margin-left: 1.4rem; margin-top: 0.08rem;}.slide4>.zuo3{ width: 4rem; height: 2rem; position: absolute; top: 7.6rem; left: 0rem;}.slide4>.zuo3>p{ position:relative; bottom:-1.655rem; right:-2.495rem; font-size: 0.3rem; color:#261a3b; font-weight: bold;}.slide4>.zuo3>i{ display: block; font-size: 0.25rem; color:#261a3b; margin-top:0.6rem; margin-left: 0.1rem; font-style: normal;}.slide4>.zuo3>.s3,u,b{ display: block; font-size: 0.25rem; color:#261a3b; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: none; margin-top:0.08rem; margin-left: 0.1rem; font-style: normal;}.slide5{ background-image: url("../img/b8.png"); background-size: 100% 100%;}.slide5 .lian,.dian5,ul>.dian1,.dian2,.dian3,.dian4{ opacity: 0;}#page5>.lian{ -webkit-animation: fadeIn 2s linear both; animation: fadeIn 2s linear both;}#page5>ul>.dian1{ -webkit-animation: fadeIn 1s 1s linear both; animation: fadeIn 1s 1s linear both;}#page5>ul>.dian2{ -webkit-animation: fadeIn 1s 2s linear both; animation: fadeIn 1s 2s linear both;}#page5>ul>.dian3{ -webkit-animation: fadeIn 1s 3s linear both; animation: fadeIn 1s 3s linear both;}#page5>ul>.dian4{ -webkit-animation: fadeIn 1s 4s linear both; animation: fadeIn 1s 4s linear both;}#page5>.dian5{ -webkit-animation: fadeIn 1s 5s linear both; animation: fadeIn 1s 5s linear both;}.slide5>.lian{ width: 5rem; text-align: center; border-bottom: 0.01rem solid whitesmoke; margin: 1.6rem auto;}.slide5>.lian>p{ font-size: 0.5rem; color:whitesmoke; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;}.slide5>ul{ width: 5rem; text-align: left; margin: -0.8rem auto;}.slide5>ul>li{ font-size: 0.35rem; color:whitesmoke; margin-bottom: 0.8rem;}.slide5>p{ width: 3rem; text-align: center; margin: 2.2rem auto; font-size: 0.4rem; color: whitesmoke;}.slide6{ /*background-image: url("../img/b9.png"); background-size: 100% 100%;*/ background-color: #ccffcc;}.slide6>.hou1{ width: 5rem; height: 2.8rem; border-bottom:0.04rem solid white; margin: 0 auto; text-align: center;}.slide6>.hou2,.hou3,.hou1,.hou1>.hou4{ opacity: 0;}#page6>.hou1>.hou4{ -webkit-animation:fadeIn 2s 2s linear both; animation:fadeIn 2s 2s linear both;}#page6>.hou1{ -webkit-animation:fadeInUp 2s linear both; animation:fadeInUp 2s linear both;}#page6>.hou2{ -webkit-animation:fadeInUp 2s 3s linear both; animation:fadeInUp 2s 3s linear both;}#page6>.hou3{ -webkit-animation:fadeInUp 2s 4s linear both; animation:fadeInUp 2s 4s linear both;}.slide6>.hou1>p{ font-size: 0.5rem; color: darkblue; padding-top: 1.6rem;}.slide6>.hou2{ width: 3rem; height:2.89rem; overflow: hidden; margin: 1rem auto;}.slide6>.hou2>img{ width: 3rem; height:3rem; /* margin-top: -0.3rem; margin-left: -0.2rem;*/}.slide6>.hou3{ width: 4rem; margin: 1.7rem auto; color:skyblue; font-size: 0.3rem; text-align: center;} 百度 插入图片:
